titleInfo.title: Localized random and arbitrary errors in the light of AV channel theory

mods.abstract: We introduce probabilistic communication models with localized errors and determine the optimal rates of codes, if a priori error patterns or actual errors or both occur at random according to uniform distributions. There are strong connections to the theory of arbitrarily varying channels.
